content.text:
Could you post the relevant bits of the rest of the debug log? It sounds like it's trying to parse JSON (maybe `package.json`?) and hitting something invalid. It might also be helpful to post the output of `npm version`, here's mine:

```javascript
{ npm: '6.10.1',
  ares: '1.15.0',
  brotli: '1.0.7',
  cldr: '35.1',
  http_parser: '2.9.2',
  icu: '64.2',
  modules: '64',
  napi: '4',
  nghttp2: '1.36.0',
  node: '10.16.0',
  openssl: '1.1.1b',
  tz: '2019a',
  unicode: '12.1',
  uv: '1.30.1',
  v8: '6.8.275.32-node.52',
  zlib: '1.2.11' }
```
